entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
